content:
Mohan Nataraj is a professional Computer Scientist & Pure Mathematician from the Silicon Valley of India (Bangalore) with professional experience of two or more years working in start up in the Bay Area. My research interests include distribution of prime number, continous and discrete topology (graph theory), statistics and any programmable matter. I lead myself with great confidence at any work I do.
I imperiously believe in the following quote,
“It is by his activities and not by enjoyment that a man feels he is alive. In idleness we not only feel life is fleeting, but also feel lifeless “ - Immanuel Kant
C’est par ses activités et non par plaisir qu’un homme se sent vivant. Dans l’oisiveté, non seulement nous sentons que la vie est fugace, mais nous nous sentons également sans vie
